content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 04.03.24 are approximately:

  • personnel - 417950 (+1150) persons liquidated
  • tanks - 6648 (+8)
  • combat armored vehicles - 12660 (+21)
  • artillery systems - 10210 (+22)
  • RSW - 1004 (+1)
  • air defense means - 698 (+2)
  • aircraft - 347 (0)
  • helicopters - 325 (0)
  • UAV Operative-tactical level-7845 (+2)
  • Winged missiles - 1916 (+1)
  • ships / boats - 25 (0)
  • submarines - 1 (0)
  • automobile equipment and tanks - 13374 (+42)
  • Special Technique - 1621 (+1)

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source: General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 04.03.24.
title: RF loss per day: minus 1150 invaders, 21 BBMs and 22 artsystems were destroyed
author: Army Inform
